title: Basic First Aid in Emergencies
content:
1. Check the scene for safety.
2. Call for help (108 in India).
3. Control bleeding by applying direct pressure.
Important during floods or accidents when help is delayed.

title: Water Purification Methods (SODIS)
content:
Fill a clear PET bottle with water.
Leave it in direct sunlight for 6 hours (or 2 days if cloudy).
UV rays + heat kill pathogens.
Critical in rural areas without clean water.

title: Racism Awareness
content:
Racism is the belief that different races are inherently superior or inferior. 
It can lead to discrimination and prejudice in society.
